sys_ui_message.key:
Total number of VMs discovered by CMP is given by: CMP_DISCOVERED = ALL - (CMP_PROVISIONED + DEEP_DISCOED_VMS)
Substituting values obtained we get, (ALL - (CMP_PROVISIONED + DEEP_DISCOED_VMS)) = ( {0} - ( {1} + {2} ) )
sys_ui_message.message: Загальна кількість виявлених КМП віртуальних машин обчислюється за допомогою: CMP_DISCOVERED = ALL - (CMP_PROVISIONED + DEEP_DISCOED_VMS) Підставляючи отримані значення, ми маємо (ALL - (CMP_PROVISIONED + DEEP_DISCOED_VMS)) = ( {0} - ( )
sys_ui_message.sys_name:
Total number of VMs discovered by CMP is given by: CMP_DISCOVERED = ALL - (CMP_PROVISIONED + DEEP_DISCOED_VMS)
Substituting values obtained we get, (ALL - (CMP_PROVISIONED + DEEP_DISCOED_VMS)) = ( {0} - ( {1} + {2} ) )
